#summary List of related scientific articles.

= Introduction =

The references listed here are not necessarily used (yet) in Peacock, nor is this list necessarily complete.


= Mass Spectral Library Search Algorithms =

References (in no particular order):
  * Stephen E. Stein (1994) Estimating probabilities of correct identification from results of mass spectral library searches [http://dx.doi.org/10.1016/1044-0305(94)85022-4 10.1016/1044-0305(94)85022-4]
 * Stephen E. Stein, Donald R. Scott (1994) Optimization and testing of mass spectral library search algorithms for compound identification [http://dx.doi.org/10.1016/1044-0305(94)87009-8 10.1016/1044-0305(94)87009-8]
 * Barbara L. Atwater, Douglas B. Stauffer, Fred W. McLafferty, and David W. Peterson (1985) Reliability ranking and scaling improvements to the probability based matching system for unknown mass spectra [http://dx.doi.org/10.1021%2Fac00281a028 10.1021/ac00281a028]
 * Douglas B. Stauffer, Fred W. McLafferty, Robert D. Ellis, and David W. Peterson (1985) Adding forward searching capabilities to a reverse search algorithm for unknown mass spectra [http://dx.doi.org/10.1021%2Fac00280a045 10.1021/ac00280a045]
 * Douglas B. Stauffer, Fred W. McLafferty, Robert D. Ellis, and David W. Peterson (1985) Probability-based-matching algorithm with forward searching capabilities for matching unknown mass spectra of mixtures [http://dx.doi.org/10.1021%2Fac00283a021 10.1021/ac00283a02]
